name: CalmMyPet
0:
”Alexa, play calm my pet”
”Alexa, ask calm my pet to forward”
”Alexa, ask calm my pet to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm my pet
des:
Sit back, relax and immerse yourself listening to calming melodies one after another.
This skill gives company to your pets even when you may be away. A series of classical instrumental songs at right tempo that are pleasing and have a deep calming influence on pets and humans. These rich meditative sounds help improve awareness and focus, reduce stress and result in positive vibes all around. 

Before adding any new melody extensive research is done with our family pets, and this is a collection of most relaxing instrumental music tracks. 

HOW TO USE
Before first use, enable the skill by pressing the Enable button in the Skill Store, then say "Alexa, open Calm My Pet" to begin.
To finish, say "Alexa, stop".

Got a distraction or need a break? No problem. Simply say 'Alexa, Pause' and resume listening to the playlist when you return by saying 'Alexa, Resume'. 
To move to next or previous song, you can say 'Alexa, Next', or 'Alexa, Previous' .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
